meaning: Making low feeble sounds out of sadness-fear-pain (v)
To cry in a noisy way like a child (v)
cry and sniff in a feeble or fretful way (v)
run with quick light steps - especially through fear or excitement (v)
To move or act quickly - more like a horse (v)
To move or act quickly - more like a bird (v)
To persuade someone to do something by gentle and persistent effort (v)
To employ flattery or insincere praise to persuade someone to do something (v)
